security.comment: Set allow_cdn_fallback to true if vendor libraries failed to download and CDN is needed

sharing.comment: Set shared_dictionary_path to a network folder path (e.g., \\server\share\twr) to enable team dictionary sharing

acronym_settings.comment: When false (strict mode), all acronyms must be defined in the document. When true, common well-known acronyms are suppressed.

hyperlink_settings.comment: Validation modes: 'offline' (format only) or 'validator' (full HTTP with auth). For CAC/PIV: set client_cert_path and client_key_path. For .mil/.gov PKI: set ca_bundle_path to DoD root CA bundle. For enterprise networks: set proxy_url.
